recipe.title: Chicken Cobb Salad Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; shredded rotisserie chicken ; (60 g)

steps.step: Make the dressing: Combine blue cheese dressing, salt, and pepper in a 16-ounce (480 ml) mason jar. Stir with a fork until well-combined.
Add the tomato, chicken, bacon bits, hard boiled egg, and lettuce.
Store in the refrigerator for 2-3 days.
When ready to eat, shake well to combine.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Make the dressing: Combine blue cheese dressing, salt, and pepper in a 16-ounce (480 ml) mason jar.
Stir with a fork until well-combined.
Add the tomato, chicken, bacon bits, hard boiled egg, and lettuce.
Store in the refrigerator for 2-3 days.
When ready to eat, shake well to combine.
